content: {"locationId": "3740", "organizationId": "3221", "name": "St. Peter the Apostle Church", "address1": "1510 Matamoros", "address2": "", "city": "Laredo", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "78040", "country": null, "phone": "956-723-6301", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "27.5066874", "longitude": "-99.5105818", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "St Peter the Apostle Church Food Pantry is located at 1510 Matamoros.  It is in the corner of Santa Maria and Matamoros.  The City of Laredo bus station is found three blocks away.  Our mission is to assist families thru food distribution every second Saturday of each month.  We also provide donated used clothing and other necessary items.  Our distributions are possible with parishioners monetary donations and other donated items provided.  ", "notes": "We will be providing food bank cards in the coming months.  These cards are needed in order to pick up your monthly food bag.  Please make sure you ask for your card.  ", "contactName": "Patricia Reyes Morales", "contactPhone": "956-723-6301", "contactEmail": "cre@stpetertheapostlelaredo.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 34, "regionName": "South Texas Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "a240c44f-ec2b-4266-9249-8dcbd8731c06.jpg", "website": "https://www.southtexasfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Saturday 8:00 AM-9:30 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
